name: ballerina wrap top
notes:
a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here.][1] note that the long sleeve version is only available as a paid pattern.

add a trendy feminine touch to your wardrobe this fall with the ballerina wrap top. this cropped cutie pairs perfectly with high-waisted jeans or sailor pants and looks stunning on its own or atop a camisole. this sweater top moves from day to night effortlessly and also looks lovely and elegant with a pencil skirt and bandana scarf.

**sizes**
xs (s, m, l, xl) (2xl, 3xl, 4xl, 5xl)
suggested negative ease: 0-2”/0-5cm
pictured in size s on model with 34”/86.5cm bust (short sleeve) and size m on model with 38”/96.5cm bust (long sleeve)

**finished dimensions**
bust circumference when closed: 28 (32, 36, 40, 44) (48, 52, 56, 60)”/ 71 (81.5, 91.5, 101.5, 112) (122, 132, 142, 152.5)cm
length: 16.5 (17, 17.5, 18.5, 19.5) (20.25, 21.75, 23, 24)”/ 42 (43, 44.5, 47, 49.5) (51.5, 55, 58.5, 61)cm

**difficulty level**
intermediate

**skills**
knitting
purling
m1l and m1r increases
k2tog, k2tog tbl, and ssk decreases
working flat and in the round
i-cord bind off
regular and applied i-cord

all patterns are written in standard us terms.
